transcript:
Customer: Aap ya vyaktila call kela aahe.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good evening sir.
Customer: Good evening madam.
Executive: Ji sir aapke mail pe na ek message gaya hoga ticket closer ka ek bar check kijiye.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Aapke mail pe na ek message gaya hoga closer ticket ka.
Customer: Dekhiye ek bar search kijiye ticket.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Customer: Ha yaar.
Executive: Nahi aaya?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ticket ka closer.
Executive: Sir ek bar dekho mail pe waha pe ticket ticket type karo.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Kuch aa raha hai waha pe satisfied not satisfied karke kuch options aata hai ticket close karne ka.
Customer: Ha idhar mere ko to khali ek hi option dikh raha hai non satisfied ka.
Executive: Fir not satisfied ka option dikh raha hai.
Customer: Ek minute dekho mere pass mail aa gaya hai. Aa gaya. Mail pe ye bol rahi hu sir mail check karo. Ha aap aap kya dale isme satisfied dale ki non satisfied dale. Satisfied dalo sir.
Customer: Thik hai aap keh rahe hai to hum satisfied dal dete hai.
Executive: Sir aapki baat ho gayi hai na Vinith se?
Customer: Baat to ho gayi hai.
Customer: Aap hame bahut sara business dene wale hai isliye dal rahe hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir waha pe do cheeze aa rahi hogi mark kijiye.
Executive: Ha ho gaya.
Customer: Ho gaya?
Executive: Ji aa gaya sir. Sir aapko koi bhi dikkat ho sir aap log mujhe call kijiyega ya Vinith ko call kijiyega.
Customer: Aap bas yahi koshish kijiye ki mujhe mujhe kisi bhi tarah ye phone karke bechne na baith jaye koi bhi.
Executive: Kya? Sir to ispe aapka discussion hua hai na Vinith se aapko call kiya tha na usne.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul wo bol rahe ki hum prayas kar rahe hai prayas se jyada aap execution pe focus kijiye. Ki hame leads dikhe leads to jab aap likh rahe hai ek bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir wo to mujhe bata rahe the ki teen char din tak kafi achi baat hui hai aapke leads pe.
Customer: Ha aap aap bhi baat kar lo unse pucho kya kya manga hai un logo ne.
Executive: Sir dekho total
Customer: Sir dekho aapko kal bhi maine bataya tha sir profile agar google pe run ho to total
Executive: Aapka call hold par 6 minute pehle aaya tha. Krupaya line varach raha athva thodya velani call kara. Khatechi mahiti bill payment kiva recharge aani aaplyasati khas offer milavnyasathi Vi app login kara. Aapka call hold par rakha gaya hai. Kripaya line par bane rahe ya kuch der baad call kare.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving expected leads.

- Customer does not want unsolicited sales calls.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to mark ticket as satisfied.

- Executive assured customer to call if any issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, ticket closure, satisfaction
